Texts.Eng: Once you place it, use your ^orange;wiring tool^reset; to link to a ^orange;generator^reset; to a ^orange;blue node^reset; on your battery.
You don't ^green;need^reset; batteries but they ^green;will^reset; be extremely useful. Create a ^orange;1000J 4W Battery Unit^reset; in your ^green;Electronics Center^reset; to try one out.
